movie_title: Your Time Machine Broke - At The Worst Time In History
introduction: Go to https://brilliant.org/nutshell/ to dive deeper into these topics and more with a free 30-day t

vocabulary.definition: barren or laid waste; devastated; deprived or destitute of inhabitants
vocabulary.example: The desolate landscape stretched as far as the eye could see, devoid of any signs of life.

vocabulary.definition: characterized by enmity or ill will; very unfriendly; opposed in feeling, action, or character
vocabulary.example: The hostile environment made it difficult for any living creature to survive.

vocabulary.definition: furnished with supercharge; causing to operate at a higher capacity or level than as specified
vocabulary.example: The atmosphere in the alien jungle was supercharged with oxygen, enabling the creatures to grow to enormous sizes.

vocabulary.definition: strikingly bold or brilliant; showy; conspicuously dashing and colorful
vocabulary.example: The flamboyant display of colors in the alien plants mesmerized the time traveler.

vocabulary.definition: uncanny, so as to inspire superstitious fear; weird; suggestive of the supernatural; mysterious
vocabulary.example: The eerie silence of the alien world sent shivers down the time traveler's spine.

vocabulary.definition: thrillingly beautiful, remarkable, astonishing, exciting, or the like
vocabulary.example: The view of the supernova explosion was truly breathtaking, leaving the observer in awe.
